languages.text: "Если позволите — я бы рекомендовал вам высадиться инкогнито. Вы еще много раз успеете ощутить сладость и бремя власти, но прямо сейчас — последний момент, когда вы можете извлечь выгоду из безвестности. По крайней мере ваше появление не будет привлекать особо большого внимания. Вдобавок люди будут видеть в вас человека, а не всемогущего помазанника Императора — иногда это бывает на руку".

traits.locale_text: "Если позволите — я бы рекомендовал вам высадиться инкогнито. Вы еще много раз успеете ощутить сладость и бремя власти, но прямо сейчас — последний момент, когда вы можете извлечь выгоду из безвестности. По крайней мере ваше появление не будет привлекать особо большого внимания. Вдобавок люди будут видеть в вас человека, а не всемогущего помазанника Императора — иногда это бывает на руку".

languages.text: "If I may, I would recommend arriving incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savour the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."
languages.original_text: "Если позволите — я бы рекомендовал вам высадиться инкогнито. Вы еще много раз успеете ощутить сладость и бремя власти, но прямо сейчас — последний момент, когда вы можете извлечь выгоду из безвестности. По крайней мере ваше появление не будет привлекать особо большого внимания. Вдобавок люди будут видеть в вас человека, а не всемогущего помазанника Императора — иногда это бывает на руку".

traits.locale_text: "If I am allowed to speak, I would recommend you arrive incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savor the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way your appearance will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — sometimes it can turn the situation to your advantage."

"If I am allowed to speak, I would recommend you arrive incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savor the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way your appearance will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — sometimes it can turn the situation to your advantage."

This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."

This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."

"If I may, I would recommend arriving incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savour the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."

languages.text: «Si me lo permite, le recomendaría llegar de incógnito. Tendrá ocasiones de sobra para disfrutar de las mieles del poder y para soportar la pesada carga que supone, pero esta es la última vez que podrá refugiarse en el secreto. Si su llegada no llama demasiado la atención, la gente le tratará como a una persona y no un{mf||a} gobernante todopoderos{mf|o|a} nombrado por el Emperador. Podría conducir a algunas situaciones provechosas».
languages.original_text: "If I may, I would recommend arriving incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savour the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."

traits.locale_text: «Si me lo permite, le recomendaría llegar de incógnito. Tendrá ocasiones de sobra para disfrutar de las mieles del poder y para soportar la pesada carga que supone, pero esta es la última vez que podrá refugiarse en el secreto. Si su llegada no llama demasiado la atención, la gente le tratará como a una persona y no un{mf||a} gobernante todopoderos{mf|o|a} nombrado por el Emperador. Podría conducir a algunas situaciones provechosas».

languages.text: “如果需要我的建议的话，我建议你低调行事。你以后会有很多机会品尝权力的好处与负担，但你以后恐怕不会再有隐姓埋名的机会了。低调来访不会引起任何人注意，大家不会把你当成帝皇任命的领主，而是会把你当成活生生的人。在这种情况下，你可以让某些事情变得对你更加有利。”
languages.original_text: "If I may, I would recommend arriving incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savour the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."

traits.locale_text: “如果需要我的建议的话，我建议你低调行事。你以后会有很多机会品尝权力的好处与负担，但你以后恐怕不会再有隐姓埋名的机会了。低调来访不会引起任何人注意，大家不会把你当成帝皇任命的领主，而是会把你当成活生生的人。在这种情况下，你可以让某些事情变得对你更加有利。”

languages.text: 「できるなら、身分を隠して到着するといい。権力の甘さと重荷を味わう機会はたっぷりあるが、今が知られずコッソリ動ける最後のときだ。そうすればあまり注目されずに到着して、民は君を皇帝に任命された全能の権力者ではなく、ひとりの人間として扱ってくれるだろうーーこれでいくらかの状況が有利に働く可能性がある」
languages.original_text: "If I may, I would recommend arriving incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savour the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."

traits.locale_text: 「できるなら、身分を隠して到着するといい。権力の甘さと重荷を味わう機会はたっぷりあるが、今が知られずコッソリ動ける最後のときだ。そうすればあまり注目されずに到着して、民は君を皇帝に任命された全能の権力者ではなく、ひとりの人間として扱ってくれるだろうーーこれでいくらかの状況が有利に働く可能性がある」

languages.text: "Falls Ihr gestattet, würde ich empfehlen, inkognito zu bleiben. Ihr werdet noch reichlich Gelegenheit haben, die Freuden und Belastungen der Macht zu erleben, aber jetzt könnt Ihr zum letzten Mal unerkannt auftreten. Dadurch erregt Eure Ankunft wenig Aufmerksamkeit, und die Leute behandeln Euch wie ihresgleichen und nicht wie {mf|den allmächtigen Souverän, der|die allmächtige Souveränin, die} vom Imperator gesalbt wurde – das könnte in manchen Situationen von Vorteil sein."
languages.original_text: "If I may, I would recommend arriving incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savour the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr gestattet, würde ich empfehlen, inkognito zu bleiben. Ihr werdet noch reichlich Gelegenheit haben, die Freuden und Belastungen der Macht zu erleben, aber jetzt könnt Ihr zum letzten Mal unerkannt auftreten. Dadurch erregt Eure Ankunft wenig Aufmerksamkeit, und die Leute behandeln Euch wie ihresgleichen und nicht wie {mf|den allmächtigen Souverän, der|die allmächtige Souveränin, die} vom Imperator gesalbt wurde – das könnte in manchen Situationen von Vorteil sein."

languages.text: « Si je puis me permettre, je vous recommande de débarquer incognito. Vous ne manquerez pas d'occasions de goûter au privilège et au fardeau du pouvoir, mais pour l'heure, vous avez la possibilité de vous réfugier dans l'obscurité une dernière fois. Si vous arrivez discrètement, les gens vous traiteront comme une personne ordinaire et non comme {mf|le tout-puissant souverain choisi|la toute-puissante souveraine choisie} par l'Empereur. Cela pourrait vous donner un avantage dans certaines situations. »
languages.original_text: "If I may, I would recommend arriving incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savour the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."

traits.locale_text: « Si je puis me permettre, je vous recommande de débarquer incognito. Vous ne manquerez pas d'occasions de goûter au privilège et au fardeau du pouvoir, mais pour l'heure, vous avez la possibilité de vous réfugier dans l'obscurité une dernière fois. Si vous arrivez discrètement, les gens vous traiteront comme une personne ordinaire et non comme {mf|le tout-puissant souverain choisi|la toute-puissante souveraine choisie} par l'Empereur. Cela pourrait vous donner un avantage dans certaines situations. »

languages.text: "Haddimi aşmak gibi olmasın ama kimliğini gizleyerek girmeni öneririm. Elindeki gücün tadını çıkarabileceğin ve yükünü omuzlayabileceğin nice fırsat olacak, şu ansa gizli hareket edebileceğin son seferin. Bu sayede gelişin fazla dikkat çekmez ve insanlar sana İmparator'un kutsadığı kudretli bir hükümdar gibi değil de sıradan biri gibi davranır. Bu da bazı durumları lehine çevirmene imkân tanıyabilir."
languages.original_text: "If I may, I would recommend arriving incognito. You will have plenty of opportunities to savour the sweetness and the burden of power, but right now is the last time you can take refuge in obscurity. This way, your arrival will not draw much attention, and the people will treat you as a person and not the almighty sovereign anointed by the Emperor — it could turn some situations to your advantage."

traits.locale_text: "Bense kimliğini gizleyerek girmeni öneririm. Elindeki gücün tadını çıkarabileceğin ve yükünü omuzlayabileceğin nice fırsat olacak ama şu an gizli hareket edebileceğin son an. Bu sayede gelişin fazla dikkat çekmez ve insanlar sana İmparator tarafından atanmış kudretli bir hükümdar gibi değil de bir insan gibi davranır. Bu da bazı durumları avantajına çevirmene imkân tanıyabilir."
